topic: Reminder to submit abstract to Radiance workshop
body:
The organization of the 15th Radiance International Workshop is well in progress. 
So far, we have abstracts from Roland Schregle, Greg Ward, Andy McNeil, David Geisler-Moroder, John Mardeljevic and other prominent researchers, 
but there are some slots still available for presentations.
We would like to foster as much participation as possible and allow the abstract submission to those who have not jet decided. 
The deadline is the 31st of July. For more details visit http://www.2016radianceWS.org
We look forward to meet you in Padua.
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2016-July/011863.html).</sup>
